actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the term of the office of the President to one six-year term.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Establishes a single six-year term of office for the President. Prohibits any person who has held the office of the President to which some other person was elected from being elected to the office of President.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the term of the office of the President to one six-year term.
